original_text: On the first day of every week, each of you is to put something aside and store it up, as he may prosper, so that there will be no collecting when I come.
korean_text: 매주 첫날에 너희 각 사람이 수입에 따라 모아 두어서 내가 갈 때에 연보를 하지 않게 하라

sentences.original_text: On the first day of every week,
each of you is to put something aside
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각자는 무언가를 따로 마련해 두고

sentences.original_text: so that there will be no collecting
